trans-unit.source: Provides access to the main buffered graphics context object for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce accesso all'oggetto di contesto grafico principale memorizzato nella cache per il dominio applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager> class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager> classe consente di implementare il doppio buffer personalizzato per le immagini.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Le immagini che utilizzano il doppio buffer possono ridurre o eliminare lo sfarfallio causato da ridisegnare una superficie di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: This class has one static property, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, which returns the main <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe ha una proprietà statica, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, che restituisce l'oggetto principale <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> per il dominio applicazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class creates <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> instances that can be used to draw buffered graphics.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> Crea classe <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> istanze che possono essere usate per disegnare la grafica memorizzata nel buffer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe non dispone di alcun costruttore pubblico e deve essere creato dal <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> oggetto per un dominio applicazione mediante il relativo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile recuperare il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> oggetto per il dominio applicazione corrente da statico <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: For more information on double buffering, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, and <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul doppio buffer, vedere [grafica a doppio buffer](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, e <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates acquiring the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente illustra l'acquisizione di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> per il dominio applicazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> per il dominio applicazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> per il dominio dell'applicazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: Within an application the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A> property always returns the same <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object.
trans-unit.target: All'interno di un'applicazione di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A> proprietà restituisce sempre lo stesso <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates acquiring the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente illustra l'acquisizione di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> per il dominio applicazione corrente.
